scripts.all: npm run db && npm run server
scripts.all:stop: npm run db:stop && npm run server:stop
scripts.all:status: npm run db:status && npm run server:status
scripts.all:restart: npm run db:stop && npm run server:stop && npm run db && npm run server
scripts.db:status: if [ "`pgrep mongo`" = "" ]; then echo "Stopped⛔️"; else echo "Runnning✅"; fi;
scripts.server:status: if [ "`pgrep ScapeNode-0`" = "" ]; then echo "Stopped⛔️"; else echo "Runnning✅"; fi;
